article.topic: How to Do Blog SEO the Right Way Using ChatGPT Without Ruining Your Brand (如何正确使用 ChatGPT 做博客 SEO 而不毁掉品牌)
article.writingAngle: 效率流程 - 如何用 AI 提升内容生产效率，同时保持质量

company.name: Semrush
company.coreBusiness: Semrush provides a comprehensive software platform for digital marketing professionals, offering tools for search engine optimization, paid advertising analysis, content marketing, competitive intelligence, and social media management.
company.valueProposition: An all-in-one digital marketing platform that enables marketers to analyze competitors, track search rankings, audit websites, and optimize content across multiple marketing channels. The unified Semrush One platform integrates multiple toolkits for comprehensive marketing management.

audience.description: Marketing managers, small business owners with some experience, content managers, startup founders
audience.industry: Marketing managers, small business owners with some experience, content managers, startup founders

alreadyKnows: Basic SEO and digital marketing concepts
AI tools like ChatGPT exist and can generate content
needsToLearn: How to use AI for content creation without compromising quality
Practical workflow for AI-assisted blog writing
How to maintain brand voice when using AI
Specific techniques to humanize AI-generated content
When to use AI vs. human writing for different content types

typicalQuestions: How to use ChatGPT for blog writing
Can AI content rank on Google?

writingApproach.complexity: Moderate; can use industry terms with brief clarification
writingApproach.structure: Problem-solution format; comparison tables; numbered lists

do: Provide decision frameworks: 'When choosing between tools, consider these factors...'
Offer concrete recommendations: 'For blogs targeting long-tail keywords...'
Provide real examples and screenshots where applicable
dont: Use overly technical jargon without context
Assume readers have used advanced SEO tools before

userContext.situation: Marketers are aware ChatGPT can speed up content creation, but worry about sacrificing quality, authenticity, and brand voice. They've seen low-quality AI content and want to avoid that trap while still gaining efficiency.
userContext.currentState: Currently either: (1) manually writing all blog content (slow), (2) using AI but worried about quality/detection, or (3) avoiding AI entirely due to concerns about brand damage
userContext.desiredState: Want a reliable, step-by-step workflow to use ChatGPT for blog SEO that produces quality content that ranks well AND maintains their brand's credibility and unique voice

searchIntent.coreQuestion: How can I use ChatGPT to create SEO blog content efficiently without producing generic, low-quality content that damages my brand?
implicitQuestions: What's the right workflow for AI-assisted blog writing?
How do I make AI content sound human and authentic?
What parts of blog writing should be AI vs. human?
How do I incorporate my own expertise into AI-generated drafts?
What are the specific editing steps to humanize AI content?
Can AI content rank on Google, or will it be penalized?
How do I balance efficiency (speed) with quality (brand protection)?
When should I use AI for blog content vs. write it myself?

expectedContent.format: Numbered procedural steps with practical examples and cautionary advice
expectedContent.depth: Practical how-to with specific techniques, settings, and editing checklists

searchIntent.successCriteria: Reader can implement the 10+ step workflow immediately, knows how to configure ChatGPT for better output, understands exactly what to edit/add to make AI content authentic, and can distinguish when to use AI vs. human writing for different content types

goldenInsights.insight: 86% of marketers edit AI content - the trade-off is much less writing and much more editing
goldenInsights.suggestedUse: hook - challenge the AI saves time assumption

goldenInsights.insight: Human content gets 5.44x more traffic over 5 months despite AI catching up in rankings
Only 23% of marketers with brand voice guidelines actually use them to train AI tools
Bankrate.com: 160+ AI articles, 125K visits/month - but only with expert human review

coverage: decision framework for AI vs human

controversies: AI content saves time vs editing takes longer than writing
Google penalizes AI vs Google only cares about quality
research.coreThesis: The key to using ChatGPT for blog SEO is not learning to write faster - it is learning to edit smarter. AI handles structure while humans handle soul.

emphasize: editing checklist with specific words to avoid
when to use AI vs human decision framework

opinionsIncluded: 博客 SEO 用 ChatGPT: Google 不在乎你怎么写，只在乎写得好不好
